articles.title: Apple iPhone 12 available at just Rs 37,900 on online store; Check offer details - Zee News
articles.description: If you’re planning to upgrade your smartphone and thinking of purchasing an Apple smartphone, this could be your chance, as Apple iPhone 12 is selling at a massive price cut on iStore, an official Apple reseller.
